description: Grafana Dashboard para el QNAP TVS-h1288X. Recoge los datos Telegraf y los envía al InfluxDB

targets.query:
from(bucket: "QNAPTVSh1288X")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.QNAP_TVS-h1288X")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "tiempo_uso")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "qnaptvsh1288x")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "QNAPTVSh1288X")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.QNAP_TVS-h1288X")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "firmware_version_actual")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "qnaptvsh1288x")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "conjunto_almacenamiento_1_espacio_disponible")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] == "192.168.10.2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "qnaptvsh1288x")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "QNAPTVSh1288X")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.QNAP_TVS-h1288X")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "conjunto_almacenamiento_1_espacio_disponible" or r["_field"] == "conjunto_almacenamiento_1_capacidad_total")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] == "192.168.10.2")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["host"] == "qnaptvsh1288x")
  |> pivot(rowKey:["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ r with  _value: 100.0 - (float(v: r.conjunto_almacenamiento_1_espacio_disponible) / float(v: r.conjunto_almacenamiento_1_capacidad_total) * 100.0) }))
  |> group(columns: ["source","_field","agent_host"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: ${interval}, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "QNAPTVSh1288X")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.QNAP.enclosureTable")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] != "")
  |> keep(columns: ["agent_host"])
  |> distinct(column: "agent_host")
  |> group()
list.label: Hostname
list.name: qnaphostname
list.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.QNAP.enclosureTable")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] != "")
  |> keep(columns: ["agent_host"])
  |> distinct(column: "agent_host")
  |> group()

list.definition:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "snmp.QNAP.enclosureTable")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "enclosureSerialNum" and  r["enclosureID"] == "0")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${qnaphostname:regex}/)
  |> keep(columns: ["enclosureModel"])
  |> distinct(column: "enclosureModel")
  |> group()
list.label: QNAP
list.name: qnapmodel
list.query:
from(bucket: v.defaultBucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["agent_host"] =~ /${qnaphostname:regex}/)
  |> keep(columns: ["enclosureModel"])
  |> distinct(column: "enclosureModel")
